Question: Dongguan Lianzhou Electronic Technology Co.,Ltd CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Dongguan Lianzhou Electronic Technology Co.,Ltd

Product: Tempered Glass Screen Protectors

- Specializes in mobile phone accessories
- Offers OEM/ODM manufacturing service
- Covers an area of over 6,000 square meters with more than 150 employees
- Provides one-stop service from sample to after-sale service
- Passed ISO9001:2015, BSCI, GSV, ISO14001:2015 certifications
- Emphasizes innovation and commitment to quality
- Showcased products at CES 2024
- Exhibited at Venetian Expo Booth 53771
- Engaged in discussions, showcased latest innovative products and solutions at CES 2024
- Committed to providing top quality products and cooperation for mutual benefits
